title: Uphill Legal Battle Against Texas Voting Law
itunes:title: Uphill Legal Battle Against Texas Voting Law
description:
Uphill Legal Battle Against Texas Voting Law (Podcast)

Elections law expert Richard Briffault, a professor at Columbia Law School, discusses the new Texas voting law, which is one of the most restrictive in the country.

Former federal prosecutor Elie Honig discusses his new book, "Hatchet Man: How Bill Barr Broke The Prosecutor's Code And Corrupted The Justice Department."

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
